title: EDI's
lyrics:
Popped an Edi
Now I'm zonin' bumping Makavelli

'Cause lots of fetti, her chops are steady, bitch, Akinyele
Ten'll sit me in, then the shit begins
When the dick, we blend, a bitch see yen and quickly sin

Cause we the Schei√üe, that shit in German
